芅字的基本解释

芅
yì
〔铫（
y俹 ）芅〕古书上说的一种植物，即猕猴桃。

芅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》與職切，入職，以。］
义未详。

芅字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芅； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1018第01
【唐韻】與職切，音弋。【爾雅·釋草】長楚，銚芅。【註】今羊桃也。【廣韻】或曰鬼桃，葉似桃而花白。【詩疏】銚芅之性，始生正直，及其長大，則其枝猗儺而柔順，不妄尋蔓草木。

芅字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
芅字的起名意思

古书上说的一种植物(铫芅)，即猕猴桃。

芅
Basic explanation of words
芅
yì
〔铫(
y 俹) 芅] A kind of plant mentioned in ancient books, namely kiwi fruit.
芅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" is related to the job cut, entry, to. ]
The meaning is unclear.
芅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　芅; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 1018 No. 01
[Tang Yun] cut with the job, the sound is yi. 【Erya·Shicao】Chang Chu, Choi. [Note] Sheep peach is also today. [Guangyun] Or it is called ghost peach, the leaves are like peaches and the flowers are white. [Poetry] The nature of Chuangxun begins to be upright, and when it grows up, its branches are naughty and supple, not looking for vines and trees.
